observation: Home | bestoxtrade.com  support@bestoxtrade.com Home About Us Investment offer FAQ Contact Login Sign In Sign Up Be a Bestox Trade is a high performing investment service in finance markets with unique operational expertise to identify overlooked opportunities. Select Language Afrikaans Albanian Translate Our advantages Safety Safety is of paramount importance to us. We take care of the safety of funds and the personal data of our users. Technologies We create the most technologically advanced equipment, so technology is of paramount importance to us. We use the most modern hardware. High profitability The robots we have created pay off quickly and begin to make a profit. The scope of application of robots is expanding every day, increasing our profits. Round-the-clock support Customers are of paramount importance to us. Our support team works around the clock and answers all the questions of our users. Bestox Trade is a fintech startup that provides financial services to individual investors and crypto enthusiasts. The platform allows cryptocurrency investors to earn interest on their crypto holdings by lending them to vetted institutions. Clients who have entrusted us with managing their funds get an opportunity to minimize their risks (regardless of the chosen investment strategy), and this represents one of the primary targets when working on the lucrative but risky crypto market. We are focused on investing in blockchain technologies and other major assets, the Bestox Trade team is experienced in both traditional finance and emergent blockchain technology. Advantages of our robots: 1. The use of artificial intelligence, 2. The use of self-learning, 3. The flexibility of settings, Investing is the way to your financial freedom and independence. Study our investment products and start earning right now. Start earning now Investors Check out our investment plans to choose the most profitable and suitable one. STARTER PLAN 10% After 24 Hours Minimum: $100 Maximum: $4,999 Referral Bonus: 5% Invest Now BASIC PLAN Maximum: $10,000 STANDARD PLAN 20% After 72 Hours DIAMOND PLAN 25% After 5 Days Maximum: Unlimited PREMIUM PLAN We make investments profitable and affordable for everyone! Join us to get passive income quickly and easily. With us, everyone can invest in the most modern and progressive technologies and receive passive income. Company Policy Terms of Service Email: Address: 20 East Broadway, New York, NY 10002 Copyright Â© 2023. All rights reserved by admin@keppelinnovations.com Original text Rate this translation Your feedback will be used to help improve Google Translate

thought: The text extracted from the website shows unusually high returns on investment, such as "10% After 24 Hours" and "25% After 5 Days", which could be a red flag for a scam. Additionally, there is a mention of "passive income quickly and easily", which targets human psychological weaknesses for easy money. The company also seems to be handling financial products, which is common for scam investment sites.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain was recently created, which is common for scam websites that are set up quickly to defraud people and then disappear. The registrant's details are redacted for privacy, which can be a legitimate practice but also a red flag in the context of other suspicious characteristics.

There are no recent posts on Twitter mentioning the URL bestoxtrade.com. This could suggest a lack of social media presence or discussion around the site, which might be unusual for a legitimate investment service but is common for scam websites.

There are no posts or discussions on Reddit mentioning bestoxtrade.com. This further indicates a lack of an online presence or reputation, which is a red flag for a financial service website as legitimate services often have at least some level of discussion or user feedback online. The information I have gathered so far indicates that the website has several characteristics typical of a scam website. To solidify my analysis, I should check for any additional red flags such as the site's SSL certificate validity and DNS records to ensure the domain isn't associated with known scam operations.

thought: The SSL certificate for bestoxtrade.com has been issued by a recognized certificate authority, which is common for both legitimate and scam websites. The certificate is also relatively new, matching the recent creation date of the domain. This information does not necessarily indicate a scam, but given the other red flags, it does not dispel the concerns either.

The DNS record only shows an HINFO record with "RFC8482", which is a placeholder response that doesn't provide actual information about the server or its capabilities. This is unusual for a legitimate business website where you would typically expect to see more detailed DNS records such as A, MX, or CNAME records. I now know the final answer Based on the characteristics of the URL provided, the unusually high returns on investment, the targeting of human psychological weaknesses, the lack of online presence or reputation, the recent creation of the domain, and the unusual DNS records, I have enough evidence to determine that https://bestoxtrade.com/ is a scam website.

observation.reason: The site promises unusually high returns that are not realistic targets human psychological weaknesses with promises of quick and easy passive income has a recent domain creation date lacks online presence or reputation and has unusual DNS records all of which are indicative of a scam website.
